description.en:
"Predictcoin is a crypto assets price prediction DAO, where users or ""PREDers"" can predict the
price of crypto assets at a particular time, which would be visible and accessible to all. One
question that's asked the most in the cryptosphere, is the price of a coin and when moon. Hence,
Predictcoin, a platform that'll attract the best predictors to predict crypto assests and earn
$PRED while at it. Users would get the first hand experience and see what experienced
predictors think the market would look like for a particular coin in the next few days. Thereby
learning more about the market and the experience. "
